WRITING.TEXT: This is definitely an important issue. Benzene and other chemicals from these sites are known carcinogens. Undetected leaks occur too frequently, even at local gas stations. Having citizens team up with scientists to monitor local air and water quality makes it possible to sample a wider range of sites and detect problems.
